gametext: Deploy on table. Once per turn, may use 2 Force to deploy a battleground system from Reserve Deck; reshufffle. Your non-unique starfighters apply their deployment modifiers at any location. Once per turn, if you just Force drained at a battleground system, may draw top card of Reserve Deck.
lore: Due to constant Imperial pursuit, Alliance engineers became adept at constructing new facilities quickly.
name: A New Secret Base (V)

dark_side_text: Your Ugnaughts deploy free aboard starships here. If you control, all your Ugnaughts on table are forfeit +2.
gametext: Force loss from Security Precautions is reduced by 4.\par Your Ugnaughts deploy free aboard starships here. If you control, all your Ugnaughts on table are forfeit +2.
light_side_text: Force loss from Security Precautions is reduced by 4.
name: Anoat (V)

gametext: During your deploy phase, use X Force (minimum 1) to relocate X of your characters at an interior Theed Palace site to Theed Place Throne Room. [Immune to Sense] OR If opponent occupies your location, peek at top two cards of your Reserve Deck and take one into hand.
lore: Modified S-5 security blasters can be used for a wide array of purposes.
name: Ascension Guns (V)

gametext: May add 1 pilot. Permanent pilot is (*]Dash, who provides ability of 3. During battle, if with another T-47 and about to draw a battle destiny, may draw two and choose one. Immune to attrition < 4.
lore: Enclosed.
name: Dash In Rogue 12

gametext: Use 1 Force to take a dejarik or holosite into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR Cancel a Force drain at a holosite. OR If opponent is about to place your character out of play, place that character in your Lost Pile instead.
lore: Capital starships have emergency escape pods. Equipped with food, water, flares, medpacs, hunting blaster and tracking beacon. (R2-D2 deactivated this one's beacon).
name: Escape Pod (V)

gametext: Permanent pilot is (*]Green Leader, who provides ability of 2. Adds one battle destiny with a Rebel snub fighter. During battle, may cancel immunity to attrition of one starship here; this A-wing is 'hit'.
name: Green Leader In Green Squadron 1

gametext: USED: Play a Defensive Shield from under your Starting Effect. [Immune to Sense] OR Cancel Counter Assault, [V0] Defensive Fire or Hidden Weapons. OR Make a just drawn Overload destiny = 1/2.\par LOST: Cancel Cease Fire! or I Have You Now.
lore: Smuggler and Rebel starships use black market armor plating and deflector shields to withstand enemy fire. Expensive but life-saving modifications.
name: Hear Me Baby, Hold Together (V)

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Smuggler. When deployed, may take a character with "Cloud City" in lore into hand from Reserve Deck. During battle, may use 1 Force to cancel the game text of a Dark Jedi (except Vader) at same site.
lore: \b Gambler\b0. Scoundrel. Former owner of the \ul Millennium Falcon\ul0. Despite a notorious past, has become a successful chief administrator of a Tibanna gas mining facility.
name: Lando Calrissian (V)

gametext: During battle, Mace may 'swing' one lightsaber twice. Fetts may not add battle destiny draws here. Immune to attrition < 6 (< 8 if with a Dark Jedi).
lore: Senior \b Jedi Council member\b0  who maintains rigorous adherence to the Code. Sent Qui-Gon to Naboo to accompany the Queen and learn more about the mysterious "dark warrior."
name: Mace Windu (V)

gametext: Deploy on Mace. May add 1 to a Force drain where present. Mace may add 1 to his duel total. May target a character or creature for free. Draw 2 destiny. Target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value.
lore: Elegant sword of pure energy. "This is the weapon of a Jedi Knight. Not as clumsy or as random as a blaster." A lightsaber can be dangerous to an unskilled user.
name: Mace Windu's Lightsaber

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Opponent's starships here may not 'cloak'. Smoke Screen is a Used Interrupt when targeting Melas.
lore: Sarkan \b smuggler\b0. Smokes an Essoomian gruu pipe to heighten awareness. Exiled from his home planet of Sarka for displaying curiosity in other aliens. Misses his homeworld.
name: Melas (V)

dark_side_text: While We Have A Plan on table, your Force icons here are canceled.
gametext: Once per game, may take [V1] Ascension Guns into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. You may move to here using landspeed for free.\par While We Have A Plan on table, your Force icons here are canceled.
light_side_text: Once per game, may take [V1] Ascension Guns into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. You may move to here using landspeed for free.
name: Naboo: Theed Palace Hallway (V)

gametext: Obi-Wan's deploy cost may not be increased. Power +1 for each Dark Jedi here. Once per game, may exchange two cards in hand with any one card in Lost Pile.  Immune to attrition < 5.
lore: Jedi Knight. Trained by Yoda. Friend of Bail Organa. General Kenobi became a hero of the Old Republic during the Clone Wars. Mentor of Anakin and Luke Skywalker.
name: Obi-Wan Kenobi (V)

gametext: USED: Play a Defensive Shield from under your Starting Effect. OR Target opponent's just-deployed [maintenance] card. Target may not battle (or allow opponent to deploy cards from Reserve Deck) for remainder of turn. [Immune to Sense] LOST: Cancel Trample (unless targeting an Undercover spy).
lore: "It's a good bet the Empire knows we're here."
name: Perimeter Scan (V)

gametext: Leia's deploy cost may not be modified by opponent. Adds one battle destiny if with Han or Vader. May move as a 'react' to same site as an Imperial. Once per turn, may deploy Leia Of Alderaan or Reflection from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to attrition < 4.
lore: Prominent \b leader\b0  in the struggling Alliance. Former member of the Imperial Senate. Beginning to discover her true heritage. Likes scoundrels.
name: Princess Leia (V)

gametext: While present with a Scomp link, adds one [Light Side Force] icon here. While aboard a starfighter, adds 2 to power, maneuver, and hyperspeed. Immune to Fire Extinguisher.
lore: Fiesty. Loyal. Heroic. Insecure. Rebel \b spy\b0. Excels at trouble. Incorrigible counterpart of a mindless philosopher. Has picked up a slight flutter. A bit eccentric.
name: R2-D2 (Artoo-Detoo) (V)

gametext: Target an opponent's non-superlaser weapon card. Draw destiny. Subtract 1 if your spy on table. Target lost if total destiny < target's destiny number OR Cancel an attempt to use a [permanent] weapon to target your spy (or any card with your spy).
lore: Poorly equipped Rebels must rely on clandestine strikes against the massive Imperial military. Computer 'slicing' and system tampering have proven most effective.
name: Sabotage (V)

gametext: If a Jabba's Palace site on table, deploy on table. His Name Is Anakin is canceled.  Once per turn, if Han frozen, may use 2 Force to deploy non-[Reflections III] C-3PO, Chewie, Lando, Leia or R2-D2 from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Once per game, may place this Effect out of play to retrieve an alien or [Independent] starship into hand. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: "With your wisdom, I'm sure that we can work out an arrangement which will be mutually beneficial and enable us to avoid any unpleasant confrontation."
name: Seeking An Audience (V)

gametext: May deploy without presence or Force icons. May add 3 pilots and 4 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Adds one [Light Side Force] icon here.
lore: Royal House of Alderaan consular ship. Used by Princess Leia for Imperial Senate business (and secret Rebel espionage). Captured by the \ul Devastator\ul0  over Tatooine.
name: Tantive IV (V)

gametext: If We Have A Plan on table, deploy on table. Imperials deploy +1 to Theed Palace Throne Room and, while you occupy that site, you may ignore your Objective's location deployment restrictions. Once per game, may take an [Episode 1] system and/or a [Theed] leader into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. [Immune to Alter]
lore: Actions borne of the love for one's planet can heavily outweigh those generated from simple battle orders.
name: We'll Take The Long Way

gametext: Whenever opponent deploys a character to same or adjacent site, may activate 1 Force. While with Amidala, forfeit +1, and once per turn may peek at the top card of your Force Pile and Reserve Deck; return one card to each deck or pile.
lore: The youngest handmaiden, Yane stayed behind on Naboo while Amidala pleaded her case to the Galactic Senate. \b Musician.\b0
name: Yan� (V)

gametext: \ul If opponent's starting location was Massassi Throne Room, opponent loses 1 Force when you play this Interrupt.\ul0  Add or subtract 1 from opponent's just drawn destiny. OR Activate 1 Force. OR Until end of turn, battle destiny draws may not be modified or canceled (unless being redrawn).
lore: Absolute control wielded by the Emperor enables the Imperial forces to dominate planetary systems before the Rebel Alliance can gain a foothold.
name: A Dark Time For The Rebellion (V)

gametext: Unless your starship site or Death Star on table, deploy Emperor to your site (even if converted), and up to three Effects that deploy for free, are [Immune to Alter], and have "deploy on table" (or "deploy on your side of table") in game text from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Light Side goes first. Place Interrupt in Lost Pile.
lore: "Your fleet is lost. And your friends on the Endor moon will not survive. There is no escape, my young apprentice."
name: According To My Design

gametext: Play a Defensive Shield from under your Starting Effect. [Immune to Sense] OR Cancel Mantellian Savrip or Surprise Assault. OR Cancel an attempt to remove a just-lost character from opponent's Lost Pile.
lore: Wampas pack snow around the appendages of captured prey, making use of Hoth's cold environment to immobilize them.
name: Cold Feet (V)

gametext: Adds 1 to the power of anything he pilots, 2; any capital starship. When deployed may activate up to X Force (limit 4), where X = number of ISB agents on table. While aboard a starship, its power may not be reduced by opponent.
lore: Imperial Security Bureau (ISB) officer assigned to brief Tarkin. Also ordered to ensure absolute loyalty to the Emperor. \b Leader\b0. Will stop at nothing to fulfill the Emperor's will.
name: Colonel Wullf Yularen (V)

gametext: Adds 1 to power of anything he pilots. When deployed may take an ISB agent here into hand. Once per turn, if you just drew an ISB agent for battle destiny anywhere, may take that card into hand to cancel and re-draw that destiny.
lore: ISB attache to the \ul Executor\ul0. Detention Officer. Political Liaison for COMPNOR. Responsible for all prisoner transfers. Fiercely loyal to the Emperor's New Order.
name: Corporal Vandolay (V)

dark_side_text: Once per game, may deploy a character with "Black Sun" in lore here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
gametext: Force Drain +1 here.\par Once per game, may deploy a character with "Black Sun" in lore here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
name: Coruscant: Imperial City (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. Opponent's characters deploy +1 to same site as Jabba's Prize. When you capture a character, opponent loses 1 Force. Your Force drains at same battleground as Jabba's Prize are +1. My Favorite Decoration may not be placed out of play. [Immune to Alter]
lore: The carbonite froze more than just Han's body.
name: Despair (V)

gametext: Power, defense value, and forfeit +1 for each [Dark Side Force] icon here.  Your total ability may not be reduced at same site. Your Force drains here may not be canceled by [Reflections III] Leia.
lore: Male Sakiyan, a race often employed as assassins. \b Bounty hunter\b0. Incredible infrared, peripheral vision. Has excellent aural and olfactory senses. Often tracks by scent.
name: Djas Puhr (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. While your [Endor] objective on table (and opponent's [Endor] objective not on table) opponent generates no Force at Endor system. Twice per game, may take an Imperial admiral into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: Planetary scale shield projected from surface of Endor moon. Protected second Death Star during construction. Only another superlaser could penetrate it while operational.
name: Endor Shield (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. Lost if your non-Imperial character (or starship) on table. Unless you occupy fewer locations than opponent: if you win a battle, retrieve an Imperial; and, during battle, may take an Imperial just drawn for destiny into hand to cancel and redraw that destiny. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: When Vader's forces impose the New Order upon a region, Rebel resources and lifelines are quickly eliminated.
name: Imperial Domination (V)

gametext: \ul Deploy Tatooine system (with Devastator there) and a Tatooine battleground site.\ul0  \par \b For\b0  remainder of game, you may not deploy Sandwhirl, non-Imperial characters or starships, Jabba's Palace sites, or systems.\par \b While\b0  this side up, opponent loses no Force to Tatooine Occupation or your Force drains at Tatooine system. Once per turn, may deploy a Tatooine battleground site from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. You may not deploy Admiral's Orders on your first turn.\par \b Flip\b0  this card if you control three Tatooine sites and opponent controls fewer than three Tatooine sites.\par \b While\b0  this side up, once during your control phase, may peek at up to X cards from the top of your Reserve Deck, where X = number of Tatooine locations you occupy; take one into hand and shuffle your Reserve Deck. Once per turn, may deploy a Tatooine battleground site from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Opponent's characters require +1 Force to move from Tatooine sites using their landspeed. During your draw phase, you may retrieve one trooper. \par \b Flip\b0  this card if opponent controls more Tatooine sites than you.
name: Imperial Entanglements/No One To Stop Us This Time

gametext: If a Jabba's Palace site on table, deploy on table. The Camp is canceled. May deploy Nal Hutta from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Once per battle, may lose 1 Force; your battle destiny modifiers affect your total battle destiny instead. Once per game, may retrieve non-[maintenance] alien or [Independent] starship into hand. [Immune to Alter]
lore: Jabba has won the service of many of his guards and other henchbeings through games of chance.
name: Jabba's Haven

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Adds 1 to maneuver of anything he pilots. Adds one battle destiny with opponent's Jedi, [maintenance], or [permanent weapon] card. May be targeted by Hidden Weapons. If about to be lost, may take Boba Fett into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
lore: Trade Federation \b bounty hunter.\b0
name: Jango Fett

gametext: Adds 1 to the power of anything he pilots. When deployed (or leaves table), may draw top card of Reserve Deck or Used Pile. During battle, attrition against you is -1 for each ISB agent here (limit -3). Your spies here (unless Undercover) are immune to Double Agent.
lore: Gantry officer charged with maintaining magnetic field, atmosphere and security in Death Star docking bay. After mission on Ralltiir, paranoid about infiltration by Rebel spies.
name: Lt. Pol Treidum (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. If your character in battle is about to be lost before the damage segment, it is instead lost at end of battle (if forfeited, forfeit for 0). [Immune to Alter]
lore: \b Dejarik\b0 of a Ng'ok war beast. Foul temper gives rise to bad feelings. Has razor-sharp retractable claws. Used in many systems to frighten off potential attackers.
name: Ng'ok War Beast

gametext: May add 2 pilots and 2 passengers. Power +1 for each opponent's starship here. While Jango or Boba Fett piloting, immune to attrition < 5.
lore: Originally designed as a planetary defense craft. Uses restricted jamming technology, allowing it to appear out of nowhere. Contains many hidden armaments.
name: Slave I, Symbol Of Fear

gametext: May add 6 pilots, 8 passengers, 2 vehicles and 4 TIEs. Permanent pilot provides ability of 1. If opponent's starship just moved from here, \ul Stalker \ul0 may follow it as a regular move (if within range).
lore: Originally assigned to search the Outer Rim for new worlds to subjugate. Launched the probe droid that found Echo Base. Later reassigned to Death Squadron.
name: Stalker (V)

gametext: USED: If you just drew a starship for destiny, take that starship into hand to cancel and redraw that destiny.\par LOST: Use 3 Force to retrieve a starship into hand.
lore: Several TIEs were assigned to patrol Cloud City prior to the Imperial occupation of Bespin. Their instructions were to herd any vessels attempting to escape toward the Executor.
name: TIE Sentry Ships (V)

gametext: Play a Defensive Shield from under your Starting Effect. OR If opponent just deployed a [maintenance] card, it may not battle for remainder of turn. OR Cancel Out of Commission (if attempting to place a card out of play). [Immune to Sense]
lore: "Turn it off! Turn it off! Off! TURN IT OFF!"
name: Turn It Off! Turn It Off! (V)

gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. May deploy with any cruiser using Combat Response. While aboard an [Independent] starship, opponent's battle and weapon destiny draws here are -1,
lore: Kadas'sa'Nikto. One of Jabba's best pilots. Often pilots Jabba's space yacht. \b Smuggler\b0. Prefers to be flying combat starfighters.
name: Wooof (V)
